title: Doctrine and Covenants 26
description: Revelation given to Joseph Smith the Prophet, Oliver Cowdery, and John Whitmer, at Harmony, Pennsylvania, July 1830 (see the heading to section 24).
content:
1
Behold, I say unto you that you shall let your
time
be devoted to the
studying
of the scriptures, and to preaching, and to confirming the church at
Colesville
, and to performing your
labors
on the land, such as is required, until after you shall go to the west to hold the next conference; and then it shall be made
known
what you shall do.
2
And all things shall be done by
common consent
in the
church
, by much prayer and faith, for all things you shall receive by faith. Amen.
